arts.ttl: Sunderland 1-1 Aston Villa: Wilson Isidor Goal Earns Black Cats A Point
arts.sum: Aston Villa, still on the hunt for their first Premier League goal of the season, did not find any joy in the final third, unable to pull the trigger at all inside the opening twenty minutes of play. Another goal from Wilson Isidor ensured that Sunderland did not leave the Stadium of Light empty-handed after the Frenchman's finish cancelled out Villa's opener from Matty Cash as they drew 1-1.
